text_block_list.text: On the last day of summer camp, at the seaside guesthouse…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ooh, another sunny day! How wonderful! I feel my energy rising!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: There's no time to waste! On to training!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: As role model, I must spend my time wisely!! Not a single second squandered!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: —Anyway, I can't wait for evening～♪ It's been so long since I went to a festival. D'you think they'll sell candy apples?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Why wouldn't they? But I'm more of a candy plum kinda girl. You know, the bite sized ones? They're so cute!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: … Hmm, a festival? You mean there's a festival tonight?!
choice_data_list: Guess we'll check it out after training.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: That's what I was just about to say! Heheh, it's great that we're on the same page!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: To the festival it is then! I feel like training even more now!
After finishing our training at the beach, it was time to head to the festival, as promised. However—
(chatter chatter… murmur murmur…)

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Hey… are these all people going to the festival? Yikes.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Geez… the festival's gonna be real crowded. We gotta stay close.
Indeed, the festival would likely be even more crowded. I'm suddenly getting worried about losing Sakura Bakushin O……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Thank you for waiting, trainer! I'm ready to go! Let's head straight for the festival then!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yessir, what do I promise?
choice_data_list: Be careful and don't get separated, alright?
Be careful and don't get separated, alright?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: But of course! As class president, I was intending to do just that!
choice_data_list: Should we do get separated, check your phone.
Should we do get separated, check your phone.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ooh, "keep in touch", as they say!! Very well, know you can rely on the class president!!
choice_data_list: … You do have a phone, right?
… You do have a phone, right?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yessir, of course!! It's securely in my bag!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: … Aaaah!? It's in my bag! I compleeetely forgot about it!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: But don't you worry! I'll go get it from my room right away!
Now I'm really worried……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oooooh!! Look at all these stalls! Food! Bon dancing!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I remember going to festivals with my parents when I was little… They praised me for doing so well at the shooting game and scooping goldfish.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'm starting to reeaaally look forward to this!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: No time like the present! Let's go check out all the stalls! Ready? Gooo—

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: —Bakushiiiiiiin!!!!
I quickly reached for her, but it was too late. Sakura Bakushin O disappeared full speed into the crowd……
The festival grounds were jam-packed and Sakura Bakushin O was nowhere to be found.
I kept getting "No signal" trying to call her and my only option left was to request an announce—

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Traaaiiiineeeeeeer!!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Can you hear meeee, traineeeer!!? I'm right here, Sakura Bakushin O is right here!!
I heard Sakura Bakushin O's voice coming from the crowd…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Can you hear me? Trainer I… the screen is all black?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Traaaiineeeer, where are youuuuu!!!?? My phone's screen has gone black!!!
Her phone screen is black, she says… And mine hasn't made a peep. So…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Howha!? Come to think of it, the power is…… hmmmhhmhm!? Trainer! How nice to hear you!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'm so grateful you came to me!! I was afraid I'd never see you again!
choice_data_list: At least you tried to contact me…
At least you tried to contact me…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Naturally!!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'm Sakura Bakushin O, the trusty class president! I never fail to keep my promises!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: And I know your words are always correct and righteous, trainer!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Indeed, they are just like me!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Absolutely!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I was worried that some trouble would befall us in such a large crowd!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: But! We're both safe and uninjured!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: You've found me, and I was able to let myself be found!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Truly a win-win relationship!! One in which we'll continue to give it our all! Bakushin!!
What exactly was win-win about this…? Amidst the festival music, I left my questions be and found myself simply shaking Sakura Bakushin O's hand under the starry night sky.
